Organism.description:
The scientific name associated with this taxonomy code aggregated by the NCBI Taxonomy Database.

  This name corresponds to the taxonomy identifier assigned by the PDB depositor.


References:

Sayers EW, Barrett T, Benson DA, Bryant SH, Canese K, Chetvernin V,
Church DM, DiCuccio M, Edgar R, Federhen S, Feolo M, Geer LY,
Helmberg W, Kapustin Y, Landsman D, Lipman DJ, Madden TL, Maglott DR,
Miller V, Mizrachi I, Ostell J, Pruitt KD, Schuler GD, Sequeira E,
Sherry ST, Shumway M, Sirotkin K, Souvorov A, Starchenko G,
Tatusova TA, Wagner L, Yaschenko E, Ye J (2009). Database resources
of the National Center for Biotechnology Information. Nucleic Acids
Res. 2009 Jan;37(Database issue):D5-15. Epub 2008 Oct 21.

Benson DA, Karsch-Mizrachi I, Lipman DJ, Ostell J, Sayers EW (2009).
GenBank. Nucleic Acids Res. 2009 Jan;37(Database issue):D26-31.
Epub 2008 Oct 21.

Expression_System.description:
The scientific name associated with this taxonomy code aggregated by the NCBI Taxonomy Database.

  This name corresponds to the taxonomy identifier assigned by the PDB depositor.


References:

Sayers EW, Barrett T, Benson DA, Bryant SH, Canese K, Chetvernin V,
Church DM, DiCuccio M, Edgar R, Federhen S, Feolo M, Geer LY,
Helmberg W, Kapustin Y, Landsman D, Lipman DJ, Madden TL, Maglott DR,
Miller V, Mizrachi I, Ostell J, Pruitt KD, Schuler GD, Sequeira E,
Sherry ST, Shumway M, Sirotkin K, Souvorov A, Starchenko G,
Tatusova TA, Wagner L, Yaschenko E, Ye J (2009). Database resources

Epub 2008 Oct 21.

Macromolecule.description: Combined field: pdbx_description (A description of the polymer entity) + type (The type of the polymer) + pdbx_strand_id (The PDB strand/chain id(s) corresponding to this polymer entity)

unique_Ligands.description: Combined field: comp_id (This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp) + name (A descriptive name for the transformation operation)

Title.description:
The title of the rcsb_bird_citation; relevant for journal articles, books
 and book chapters.

PDB_DOI.description:
Document Object Identifier (DOI) for this entry registered
with http://crossref.org.

Released.description: The initial date the chemical definition was released in the PDB repository.

Deposition_Author.description: Name of the audit author of the entry.

PMID.description: A link to related reference information in the citation category.

Total_Structure_Weight.description: The molecular mass (KDa) of polymer and non-polymer entities (exclusive of solvent) in the deposited structure entry.

Atom_Count.description: The number of heavy atom coordinates records per deposited structure model.

Modeled_Residue_Count.description:
The number of modeled polymer monomers in the deposited coordinate data.
 This is the total count of monomers with reported coordinate data for all polymer
 entity instances in the deposited coordinate data.

Deposited_Residue_Count.description:
The number of polymer monomers in sample entity instances in the deposited data set.
 This is the total count of monomers for all polymer entity instances reported
 per deposited structure model.

Unique_Protein_Chains.description: The number of distinct polymer entities in the generated assembly.

Solvent_Atom_Count.description: The number of heavy solvent atom coordinates records per deposited structure model.

Model_Count.description: The number of model structures deposited.

Polymer_Composition.description: Categories describing the polymer entity composition for the generated assembly.

Nonpolymer_Entity_Count.description: The number of distinct non-polymer entities in the generated assembly exclusive of solvent.

Experimental_Data_Snapshot.description: Combined field: exptl[] (数组元素类型: Exptl) + refine[] (数组元素类型: Refine)

Aggregation State.description: The aggregation/assembly state of the imaged specimen.

Reconstruction Method.description: The reconstruction method used in the EM experiment.

Conformers Calculated.description: The total number of conformer (models) that were calculated in the final round.

Conformers Submitted.description: The number of conformer (models) that are submitted for the ensemble.

Selection Criteria.description:
By highlighting the appropriate choice(s), describe the criteria used to
select this structure as a representative structure, or if an average
structure has been calculated describe how this was done.

Global_Symmetry.description: Combined field: type (数组元素类型: RcsbStructSymmetry) + symbol (where kind='Global Symmetry') (Symmetry symbol refers to point group or helical symmetry of identical polymeric subunits in Schoenflies notation)

Global_Stoichiometry.description: Combined field: oligomeric_state (数组元素类型: RcsbStructSymmetry) + stoichiometry (where kind='Global Symmetry') (Stoichiometry of a complex represents the quantitative description and composition of its subunits)
